routes.title: Accordion
routes.description: Displays an Accordion.

routes.title: Alert
routes.description: Provides feedback to the user about the status of an action or system event

routes.title: Avatar
routes.description: Displays an Avatar.

routes.title: Badge
routes.description: Briefly highlights or categorizes associated UI elements with concise visual cues for status or metadata.

routes.title: Box
routes.description: A basic layout component that serves as a wrapper or container.

routes.title: Button
routes.description: Button serves as a standardized, reusable component for triggering actions and navigating.

routes.title: Calendar
routes.description: Calendars display a grid of days in one or more months and allow users to select a single date.

routes.title: Card
routes.description: A versatile container component presents self-contained information

routes.title: Checkbox
routes.description: Displays a checkbox.

routes.title: Code
routes.description: renders code blocks

routes.title: CollapsibleMotion
routes.description: A compound component for creating smooth collapsible content with accessibility support

routes.title: ComboBox
routes.description: A combo box combines a text input with a dropdown list, allowing users to filter a list of options to items matching a query.

routes.title: DataTable
routes.description: A component that renders data sets in a tabular format

routes.title: DateInput
routes.description: A date input component allows users to enter a specific date.

routes.title: DatePicker
routes.description: a UI component for users to enter or select a specific calendar date.

routes.title: DateRangePicker
routes.description: Allows users to select a start and end date from a calendar interface.

routes.title: Dialog
routes.description: A foundational dialog component for overlays that require user attention and interaction.

routes.title: DraggableList
routes.description: A drag-and-drop list component for reordering items with keyboard navigation and accessibility support.

routes.title: Drawer
routes.description: A foundational drawer component for overlays that require user attention and interaction.

routes.title: FieldErrors
routes.description: Renders error messages based on error object configuration for form validation feedback

routes.title: Flex
routes.description: A layout component for creating flexible layouts based on CSS Flexbox.

routes.title: FormField
routes.description: displays miscellaneous inputs in a FormField context

routes.title: Grid
routes.description: An easily customizable Grid component, re-exported from Chakra UI, that provides a consistent layout structure across different products.

routes.title: Group
routes.description: Groups related elements.

routes.title: Heading
routes.description: renders a heading

routes.title: Icon
routes.description: displays icon components

routes.title: IconButton
routes.description: displays a button with an icon only as child

routes.title: Icon Toggle Button
routes.description: An interactive icon button that toggles between two binary states such as active and inactive.

routes.title: Image
routes.description: An image component is used to display visual content like photographs, illustrations, or graphics within the UI to support, illustrate, or enhance textual information.

routes.title: InlineSvg
routes.description: Render arbitrary SVG markup with XSS protection

routes.title: Kbd
routes.description: The KBD component visually renders a keystroke or key combination to highlight it within textual instructions.

routes.title: Link
routes.description: To allow a user to navigate to a different page or resource

routes.title: List
routes.description: displays a list

routes.title: LoadingSpinner
routes.description: A circular visual indicator that displays the loading status of an ongoing process

routes.title: Localized Field
routes.description: A field that allows inputting translations for a given string in multiple locales.

routes.title: Menu
routes.description: A menu displays a list of actions or options that a user can choose.

routes.title: MoneyInput
routes.description: A controlled input for money values that combines currency selection with amount input, supporting both standard and high-precision monetary values.

routes.title: Multiline Text Input
routes.description: A multiline text input component for capturing longer text content.

routes.title: NimbusI18nProvider
routes.description: Provides internationalization context for React Aria components (dates, numbers, etc.)

routes.title: NimbusProvider
routes.description: provides an environment for the rest of the components to work in

routes.title: NumberInput
routes.description: A number input allows users to enter numerical values and adjust them incrementally.

routes.title: Pagination
routes.description: Displays controls for navigating through paginated content.

routes.title: PasswordInput
routes.description: A password input is a text field that hides entered characters for secure password entry.

routes.title: ProgressBar
routes.description: A linear visual indicator that displays the loading or completion state of an ongoing process with determinate or indeterminate progress.

routes.title: RadioInput
routes.description: A set of closely related, mutually exclusive or complementary actions that are important enough to be displayed directly in the interface for quick access.

routes.title: RangeCalendar
routes.description: Calendar Range display a grid of days in one or more months and allow users to select a range of dates.

routes.title: RichTextInput
routes.description: The rich text input component allows users to input and format text using a user friendly interface. Changing standard text inputs into fully featured edits, supporting formatting, linking, and embedding.

routes.title: ScopedSearchInput
routes.description: Enables users to define where their search query is applied using a closely paired scope selector.

routes.title: SearchInput
routes.description: A search input component that allows users to enter search queries with built-in clear functionality.

routes.title: Select
routes.description: Displays a collapsible list of options and allows a user to select one of them.

routes.title: Separator
routes.description: A visual divider that separates content sections.

routes.title: SimpleGrid
routes.description: displays a simple grid / matrix

routes.title: Spacer
routes.description: A simple layout component that occupies leftover available space in flex containers

routes.title: SplitButton
routes.description: A split button merges a main action with a dropdown for related, less common actions.

routes.title: Stack
routes.description: An easily customizable Stack component, re-exported from Chakra UI, that provides a consistent layout structure across different products.

routes.title: Switch
routes.description: A clear, visual toggle, allowing users to activate or deactivate a setting quickly.

routes.title: Table
routes.description: displays a table

routes.title: Tabs
routes.description: Organizes content into distinct sections, enabling users to switch views within a single container.

routes.title: TagGroup
routes.description: A tag group is a focusable list of labels, categories, keywords, filters, or other items, with support for keyboard navigation, selection, and removal.

routes.title: Text
routes.description: Text styles are predefined collections of typography rules (including font-size, font-weight, line-height, and letter-spacing) that create reusable, consistent styles.

routes.title: TextInput
routes.description: An input component that takes in a text as input

routes.title: TimeInput
routes.description: Allows entering a time

routes.title: Toggle Button
routes.description: An interactive button that toggles between two binary states such as active and inactive.

routes.title: ToggleButtonGroup
routes.description: A set of closely related, mutually exclusive or complementary actions that are important enough to be displayed directly in the interface for quick access.

routes.title: Toolbar
routes.description: Toolbars organize related actions and controls in a compact bar for easy access. They provide consistent placement for common or contextual tasks within an application.

routes.title: Tooltip
routes.description: A contextual popup that displays a description for an element.

routes.title: VisuallyHidden
routes.description: makes content accessible to screen readers but hides it visually

routes.title: Accessibility
routes.description: Components designed to enhance accessibility and ARIA compliance.

routes.description: An explanation of what Architecture Decision Records are and how we use them

routes.description: Architecture decision record on how to structure component APIs for flexibility and maintainability

routes.description: Architecture decision record defining the lifecycle states for Nimbus components, hooks, utilities, classes, etc.

routes.description: JSX style props for styling background colors, gradients, and images.

routes.description: JSX style props for styling border and border radius.

routes.description: Components that structure the content on the page.

routes.description: React components for building robust and visually appealing applications.

routes.description: JSX style props for applying various filters to elements.
